nodes.text: The VerveGen Corporation building was the headquarters of the VerveGen Corporation in the Upper Industrial Sector on Nar Shaddaa. In 3643 BBY the building was infiltrated by Cipher Nine and Kaliyo Djannis, who interrupted a meeting between VerveGen leadership and the Eagle.
The VerveGen Corporation building appears as an area on Nar Shaddaa in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
